name: Hip Hop Forever Fringe Tank Top
description:
Hip Hop is FOREVER

This handmade fringe tank top started out as a man's t-shirt. 

Fringes start just below the graphic. Sleeves have been removed and sides of the garment have been serged for a flattering shape.

Also available as a cropped t-shirt. 
Cut just below the graphic and serged along the sides for a more flattering fit.

Made to order. 
Please allow 1-2 weeks for US delivery. 3-4 weeks for International delivery.

name: City of LA Riot Squad Crop Tank Top
description:
City of Los Angeles seal, including California flag, serves as the backdrop for the LA skyline. In the foreground march LAPD riot squad.

Original design by Graphic Villain, this handmade crop shirt started out as a man's t-shirt. 

Cut just below the graphic, sleeves removed and serged on the sides for a flattering shape.

Available in white, black or Dodger blue.

Made to order. 
Please allow 1-2 weeks for US delivery. 3-4 weeks for International delivery.

name: California Bear Muscle Tee Shirt
description:
The California flag redesigned! A growling grizzly bear sits atop a patch of grass. The 5 point star contains the California state's shape.

Original design by Graphic Villain.
Cali Bear muscle t-shirt has the sleeves cut off and sides serged for a more flattering fit. 

Available in white and black.

Made to order. 
Please allow 1-2 weeks for US delivery. 3-4 weeks for International delivery.

name: Boom City Skyline Crop Top Fringe Tank Top Black by Graphic Villain
description:
Whether your blasting hip hop, metal, or pop, this design appeals to the music geek in all of us. Graphic design of an 80s ghetto blaster with speaker skyline. Loudpeaker "halftones" dot the sky. Drippy accents and sketchy grenade mic round out the rest of the design. 

Original design by Graphic Villain.

This handmade fringe tank top started out as a man's t-shirt. 
Fringes start just below the graphic. Sleeves have been removed and sides of the garment have been serged for a flattering shape.

Made to order. 
Please allow 1-2 weeks for US delivery. 3-4 weeks for International delivery.

name: One of a Kind Watermelon Shorts Ombre Dip Dyed Degrade Sz 30
description:
These one of a kind watermelon shorts have been hand modified from a pair of retro Levi's Strauss jeans.

Cut and distressed by hand. These shorts have been bleach dipped and dip dyed to achieve a watermelon-like effect. Gunmetal studs simulate seeds.

These shorts are completely handmade, modified from a pair of post 70's retro Levi's denim jeans.
And is one of a kind. Imperfections may have occurred. Pre-washed. Colors may vary slightly from what is pictured.

Measurements while laying flat:
Waist 15"

Please note: Measurements are approximate.

name: MADE TO ORDER Custom Army Camo Shorts Handmade
description:
This listing is for 1 pair of retro or vintage Levi's denim cutoff shorts in green.

Cut, distressed and studded by hand. Camouflage print fabric is sewn to the right front panel. Brass bullet studs adorn the zipper placket.

These shorts are completely handmade, modified from a pair of post 70's retro Levi's denim jeans.

And is one of a kind. Pre-washed.

Please note that the photo is a sample and will not be the shorts that you will be receiving.

Measurements are taken while lying flat.
First measurement is the waist, second measurement is the rise (crotch seam to top of waistband)

Please note: Measurements are approximate.

name: MADE TO ORDER American Flag Levi's Denim Cutoffs Shorts
description:
These one of a kind American Flag shorts have been hand modified from a pair of retro Levi's Strauss jeans.

You will be receiving 1 pair of retro/vintage Levi's.
Shorts are available in varying shades of blue denim jeans.

Cut and distressed by hand.  This modified interpretation of Old Glory includes faded red and white stripe fabric sewn to the left front panel.  50 brass star studs have been lightly misted with white spray paint and line up along the front right panel.

These shorts are completely handmade, modified from a pair of post 70's retro Levi's denim jeans.
And is one of a kind. Imperfections may have occurred. Pre-washed. Colors may vary slightly from what is pictured.

Measurements while laying flat:
1st measurement is waist.
2nd measurement is rise (from top of shorts to crotch seam)

Please note: Measurements are approximate.

Handmade to order. Please allow 2 weeks for US delivery and 4-5 weeks for International delivery.

Cut and distressed by hand. Crochet lace trim border done by hand. Blunted spikes line the outer seam along the front left side.

These shorts are completely handmade, modified from a pair of post 70's retro Levi's denim jeans.

These shorts are handmade to order. Please allow 2 weeks for US delivery and 4-5 weeks for International shipping.

How to measure your ring size: 
1. Wrap a piece of string or paper around your finger. 
2. Mark the point of overlap with a pen. 
3. Measure with a ruler.

name: Ribbon and Chain Braided Cords Summer Bohemian Headband
description:
The perfect accessory for summer!
This bohemian braid has a lot of versatility.
 It can be worn as a headband- 
You can add that special touch to your favorite summer dress. Or it can be dressed down with a tank top and jeans for a fun everyday look.
 It can be worn as a lariat necklace- 
With a fun silhouette, this version would perfectly accent a deep v-neck. Or it can add a bit of sparkle to a monochrome top.
 It can be wrapped around as a bracelet or an anklet- 
For a fun layered look for any one of your short-sleeved tops. 
The anklet goes beautifully with a gladiator sandal.
 It can be worn as a choker- 
For the higher-necked tops, the choker is the perfect option!
Feel free and effortless when you're wearing this ribbon braided chain. It has no closure, but can be knotted for a low-maintenance look.
100% Handmade. Feel free to request custom color combinations!

Feel effortless when you're wearing this ribbon braided chain. This chain is equipped with a lobster clasp for easy adjustability. It can also be knotted for a low-maintenance look.

Teal/Tan clips onto jump rings 
 Silver chain 
 Teal and Tan ribbon 
 Lobster clasp 
 Jump rings for various placement 
 Knotted ends

Red/White Hippie Peace and Love Charms 
 Gold chain 
 Red and White ribbon 
 Adorned with fun gold hippie charms (peace, butterfly, and heart- 10 on either end) 
 No closure 
 30.5" in length (unstretched) 
 Knotted ends

Black/Gold Lucky Charms 
 Gold chain 
 Black and Gold ribbon 
 Adorned with fun gold 4 Leaf Clover Charms (5 on each end) 
 No closure 
 30" in length (unstretched) 
 Knotted ends

Periwinkle/Silver Heart Locket
 Silver chain 
 Periwinkle and silver ribbon 
 Adorned with fun silver heart locket charms 
 Silver lobster clasp 
 Silver jump rings for optional adjustability 
 36" in length (unstretched) 
 Knotted ends

name: High Waisted Retro Levi's Shorts Peeled Pocket 28W
description:
Retro distressed Levi's shorts

These shorts were modified from a retro pair of Levi's Strauss acid wash denim jeans.

Cut, frayed, and distressed, these shorts are embellished with a peeled back pocket exposing a series of gold triangle studs.

These shorts are completely handmade, modified from a pair of post 70's retro Levi's denim jeans.
And is one of a kind. Imperfections may have occurred. Pre-washed. Colors may vary slightly from what is pictured.

Hips 16"
Rise 11"

name: Vintage Camera Sweat Shirt SLR Crew Neck Pullover Photography
description:
Show your love for Film Cameras with this pullover crewneck sweater!
We love our cameras so much, that we photographed them! 
Then put them on everything! NOW offering Crew Neck Sweaters! 

This is a silkscreened sweat shirt with an image of a retro SLR camera. SLR, or Single-Lens Reflex Camera, served to revolutionize cameras. With its ability to focus, along with interchangeable lenses, resulted in a versatile favorite amongst amateurs and professionals alike. With the advent of the DSLR, appreciation for the SLR created a cult following.

All items in our shop are hand screen printed to order.
Please allow up to 2 weeks for domestic shipping and 3 weeks for International shipping.

Hand screen printed with white ink on a Gildan Crewneck Sweatshirt
7.75 oz. 50% cotton/ 50% polyester preshrunk

name: Camera Shirt Twin Lens Reflex Tee Free Shipping
description:
Twin Lens Camera Print on Shirt 
We are so inspired by our cameras, that we took a photo of them! And put them on shirts!

TLR = Twin Lens Reflex Camera
* Twin Lens  The camera uses two equal lenses, one used for viewing thru the waist-level viewfinder and for taking the photograph.
* Reflex  Behind the viewfinder lens is a mirror at a 45-degree angle, which reflects upwards.

This shirt is a tribute to the vintage, medium format camera.
The print is positioned at waist-level, much like the way you have to hold your twin lens to shoot with!


Screen Printed on a heavy weight 6 oz 100% cotton tee shirt


Please allow up to 2 weeks for US delivery and 3-4 weeks for International Shipping.

name: I HEART LA Shirt Los Angeles Music Venues Diagram Map Schematic Free Ship
description:
The Avalon. The Roxy. The House of Blues. The Greek.
Some of the greatest nights of my life have been spent in these venues. Here is a tribute to the LA music locale.

A map of Los Angeles inside an anatomical heart outline (drafted in Adobe Illustrator). 
A schematic of the music venues of LA is displayed in the design.

original artwork by i heart analogue.
(I took a few liberties by including Amoeba-Mecca for any music geek and Knitting Factory because of all the great shows I've seen there. Also, we went with "Great Western Forum" because that was the old home of our beloved Los Angeles KINGS!)

Printed with Black Ink on a heavy weight 6 oz 100% cotton tee shirt

Each shirt is hand screenprinted to order.

name: 1 Random Mystery Shirt
description:
For a very limited time, $5 mystery shirts!

We're cleaning out our shelves and giving shirts away for $5!

Are you:
a. A daring person?
b. Indecisive?
c. A lover of serge/destroy store?
d. All of the above?

If you answered yes to any of these questions, simply deposit 500 cents into your paypal account and continue reading.

First, add to cart.
Just tell us your size when you check out, and we will ship you a shirt from our store!

Then, wait patiently for 5 business days, if you are in the US or up to 3 weeks for International orders, open package and be pleasantly surprised!
Finally, enjoy your new shirt for many years to come!

What are you waiting for?! This could be you! (thank you, JLML21 for the awesome tribute photo!)

Get them while they last!

All shirts are hand screen printed with soft hand Plastisol ink. Will not wash out or fade. 
All shirts are printed on 6 oz 100% cotton AlStyle Apparel shirts.
